summary: This document is an email chain from December 6, 2019, discussing aircraft information related to Ghislaine Maxwell. It lists helicopters and private jets believed to be used by Maxwell, including their tail numbers, types, and registration details, noting her association with Jeffrey Epstein. The correspondence appears to be part of an investigative inquiry, requesting passenger manifests and emphasizing discretion due to the high-profile nature of the case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The email discusses aircraft she has/had been using, including helicopters she piloted and jets she traveled on, frequently with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as someone Ghislaine Maxwell traveled with frequently; some aircraft are associated with him.

connections.description: The document states that Maxwell traveled with Epstein frequently, and some aircraft are associated with him.

events.title: Maxwell's Pilot Certificate Issued
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell's private pilot certificate was issued.

events.title: Aircraft Information Request
events.description: An email was sent requesting aircraft information and passenger manifests for Ghislaine Maxwell's known aircraft.

locations: Wilmington, DE 19803 (address for Freedom Air International Inc, prior registrant of helicopter N722JE)
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell held a private pilot certificate issued on October 2, 2007, and personally piloted a helicopter nicknamed 'Air Ghislaine 2' (Sikorsky S-76C, tail N722JE).
Multiple aircraft are listed, including helicopters (N722JE, N491GM) and private jets (N212JE, N120JE, N909JE, N908JE), with tail numbers often containing 'JE', linking them to Jeffrey Epstein.
The correspondence is part of a high-profile investigative case, with a request for passenger manifests for these aircraft and an emphasis on discretion.
